    • Method Detail

      • extractAmountsDue

        public static <P> java.util.Map<NonExistentClass,net.corda.core.contracts.Amount> extractAmountsDue(Obligation.Terms<P> product,
                                                                                                    java.lang.Iterable<net.corda.finance.contracts.asset.Obligation.State> states)

        Convert a list of settlement states into total from each obligor to a beneficiary.

        Returns:
        a map of obligor/beneficiary pairs to the balance due.

      • netAmountsDue

        public static <P extends AbstractParty,T> java.util.Map<NonExistentClass,net.corda.core.contracts.Amount> netAmountsDue(java.util.Map<NonExistentClass,net.corda.core.contracts.Amount> balances)

        Net off the amounts due between parties.

      • sumAmountsDue

        public static <P extends AbstractParty,T> java.util.Map<P,java.lang.Long> sumAmountsDue(java.util.Map<NonExistentClass,net.corda.core.contracts.Amount> balances)

        Calculate the total balance movement for each party in the transaction, based off a summary of balances between each obligor and beneficiary.

        Type Parameters:
        P - type of party to operate on.
        T - token that balances represent
        Parameters:
        balances - payments due, indexed by obligor and beneficiary. Zero balances are stripped from the map before being returned.
